---
title: "Equity analyze"
output: equity_analyze_in_r
---

```{r}
library(ggplot2)

e <- read.csv('equity.csv', sep = ',')

```
```{r}
?aes
```

```{r}
colors()
```

```{r}
e$datetime <- as.POSIXct(strptime(e$datetime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S'))
```

```{r}
ggplot(aes(x = datetime, y = equity_curve), data = e) +
  geom_line() +
  geom_smooth(method = 'lm') +
  geom_smooth(color = 'red')
```

```{r}
ggplot(aes(x = datetime, y = drawdown), data = e) +
  geom_line() +
  geom_smooth(method = 'lm') +
  geom_smooth(color = 'red')
```
